original_text: Above the roof, there was something that looked like a throne. It was made of a blue jewel called sapphire. On the throne, high above, I saw something that looked like the shape of a man.
korean_text: 그 머리 위에 있는 궁창 위에 보좌의 형상이 있는데 그 모양이 남보석 같고 그 보좌의 형상 위에 한 형상이 있어 사람의 모양 같더라

sentences.original_text: there was something that looked like a throne
It was made of a blue jewel called sapphire
I saw something that looked like the shape of a man
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 사람의 형상처럼 보이는 것을 보았다
